sentences.sContent: Letters may be edited for length and clarity.
sentences.sCn: 信件可能要加以修改以求篇幅合适，意思明了。

sentences.sContent: a lack of clarity in the law on property rights
...but it's actually foolish: our unemployment crisis could be cured very quickly if we had the intellectual clarity and political will to act...

words.tran: 阐明（clarify的过去分词形式）；澄清
得到澄清；变得明晰；得到净化

trans.tranOther: the clarity of a piece of writing, law, argument etc is its quality of being expressed clearly
